response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge as there was no execution error. Now, the next step is to take the fish out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the fish out of the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take the fish out of the fridge

    EasyGrasp(robot, salmon)
    donothing(env)
